text: Lɔrɛ kʋyʋʋ nɛ katasɩ lɛsʋ (nɛ pɔsɩ ɖɛsʋʋ) evemiye taa, kɔsɩkɔsɩ lɔrɛ wona alɩɩna Jakar/Bumthang wɩsɩ ɖɩlɩyɛ nɛ akʋyʋʋ ñɩɣtʋ 6 nɛ cacasɩ 30 nɛ n̂ɩɣtʋ 7 nɛ cacasɩ 30.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Lɔrɛ kʋyʋʋ nɛ katasɩ lɛsʋ (nɛ pɔsɩ ɖɛsʋʋ) evemiye taa, kɔsɩkɔsɩ lɔrɛ wona alɩɩna Jakar/Bumthang wɩsɩ ɖɩlɩyɛ nɛ akʋyʋʋ ñɩɣtʋ 6 nɛ cacasɩ 30 nɛ n̂ɩɣtʋ 7 nɛ cacasɩ 30. 
English:: Note: The bus service is very limited (only a few buses a day) and the bus departs Jakar/Bumthang at 06:30 and 07:30.

text: Asɩɣnɩ cɛɛcɛ sayʋ se ɛtaatɔlɩ, ɛlɛ apɩzɩɣ nɛ akɔnɩ-ɩ kaɖɛ yee ɛ-naŋgbanzɩ ɛhɔkɩ sɩ-tɩ nɛ sɩñɩɣ asaba ana a-taa kɔyɔ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Asɩɣnɩ cɛɛcɛ sayʋ se ɛtaatɔlɩ, ɛlɛ apɩzɩɣ nɛ akɔnɩ-ɩ kaɖɛ yee ɛ-naŋgbanzɩ ɛhɔkɩ sɩ-tɩ nɛ sɩñɩɣ asaba ana a-taa kɔyɔ. 
English:: Note: All of the above activities are free of charge, but there is limited space for camping and there is a limited number of permits available.

text: Pɩha waɖɛ sɩ ɛyʋ ɛcal ɛkɔndʋ nɛ piliɖi Petabʋʋg kiɖeɖeu kɛ Rusi taa kɛ Luthiani nɔmɔʋ ɖɔm ɖeɖe.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Pɩha waɖɛ sɩ ɛyʋ ɛcal ɛkɔndʋ nɛ piliɖi Petabʋʋg kiɖeɖeu kɛ Rusi taa kɛ Luthiani nɔmɔʋ ɖɔm ɖeɖe. 
English:: Note: The map above shows the route of the second phase of the Trans-Petroleum Pipeline from Russia to Lithuania.

text: Lɔŋ tasɩyaa taɣ liu se nɔmɔʋ woɖaa ɩɩmɩlɩɣ, paasʋʋ yem yem, ɩɩyakɩ cɛtɩm kɩyakɩŋ, paasʋlʋmʋʋ yaa paamuluu lalaa se pehiɣ pa-maɣmaɣ pɛ-kɛzɛsɩ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Lɔŋ tasɩyaa taɣ liu se nɔmɔʋ woɖaa ɩɩmɩlɩɣ, paasʋʋ yem yem, ɩɩyakɩ cɛtɩm kɩyakɩŋ, paasʋlʋmʋʋ yaa paamuluu lalaa se pehiɣ pa-maɣmaɣ pɛ-kɛzɛsɩ. 
English:: Note: The high temperatures and strong winds can cause burns, irritation of the eyes, respiratory problems and even skin damage.

text: Pɩwɛɛ se ɩmaɣzɩ wondu sakɩyɛ yɔɔ pʋcɔ nɛ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ iwoki nɔmɔʋ ɖoli yɔ tɩtalɩ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Pɩwɛɛ se ɩmaɣzɩ wondu sakɩyɛ yɔɔ pʋcɔ nɛ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ iwoki nɔmɔʋ ɖoli yɔ tɩtalɩ. 
English:: Note: This article will walk you through the process of setting up a basic WordPress website.

text: Wɩsɩ taa soŋaɣ taa, pɩpɩzɩɣ nɛ pipeɣzi nɛ pɩla nʋmɔʋ wobiyaa ɛzɩ panaɣ lɩm pɛ-ɛsɩndaa yɔ (yaa wɛtʋ lɛɛtʋ mbʋ yɔ).
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Wɩsɩ taa soŋaɣ taa, pɩpɩzɩɣ nɛ pipeɣzi nɛ pɩla nʋmɔʋ wobiyaa ɛzɩ panaɣ lɩm pɛ-ɛsɩndaa yɔ (yaa wɛtʋ lɛɛtʋ mbʋ yɔ). 
English:: Note: This is a very dangerous game, and should only be played by adults.

text: Pɩwɛ kaɖɛ se ŋna peeɖe hɔŋ weyi ɩwɛnɩ piya yɔ, ɛlɛ maalikasɩ nasɩyɩ haɣ-wɛ waɖɛ se ɩsʋʋ kɩjaʋ kuduyiŋ nɩɩyɩ taa.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Pɩwɛ kaɖɛ se ŋna peeɖe hɔŋ weyi ɩwɛnɩ piya yɔ, ɛlɛ maalikasɩ nasɩyɩ haɣ-wɛ waɖɛ se ɩsʋʋ kɩjaʋ kuduyiŋ nɩɩyɩ taa. 
English:: Note: This is not a place to buy souvenirs, but only to buy food for the trip.

text: Kɩɖaʋ nakʋyʋ lɛ ɖɩsɩ sɔsɔsɩ nzɩ sɩwɛ Lɩwaarɩ kɛdɛŋga taa yaa Rɛɛ kɛdɛŋga taa yɔ sɩ-taa wobu, yaa kɩgbɛndʋʋ ɖɔnɛ ɖɔm piwolo pɩtalɩ Daniibi tɛtʋ sɔsɔtʋ taa, yaa mɛlɛ saʋ Eriyee pɔɔ yɔɔ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Kɩɖaʋ nakʋyʋ lɛ ɖɩsɩ sɔsɔsɩ nzɩ sɩwɛ Lɩwaarɩ kɛdɛŋga taa yaa Rɛɛ kɛdɛŋga taa yɔ sɩ-taa wobu, yaa kɩgbɛndʋʋ ɖɔnɛ ɖɔm piwolo pɩtalɩ Daniibi tɛtʋ sɔsɔtʋ taa, yaa mɛlɛ saʋ Eriyee pɔɔ yɔɔ. 
English: The following is a list of the most important events in the life of the Prophet Muhammad (s.a.w.):

text: Pɩpɩzɩɣ pɩwɛɛ weewee nɛ pɩkɩlɩ se nʋmɔʋ wobu ɛgbɛyɛ taa tʋmlaɖʋ weyi ɛkazɩɣ ɛyaa ɖɩjaɣyɛ nɛ pɩlakɩ nɔɔ kʋɖʋmaɣ nɛ mɩ-nʋmɔʋ yɔ, ɛnʋ ɛsɩnɩnɩ-mɩ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Pɩpɩzɩɣ pɩwɛɛ weewee nɛ pɩkɩlɩ se nʋmɔʋ wobu ɛgbɛyɛ taa tʋmlaɖʋ weyi ɛkazɩɣ ɛyaa ɖɩjaɣyɛ nɛ pɩlakɩ nɔɔ kʋɖʋmaɣ nɛ mɩ-nʋmɔʋ yɔ, ɛnʋ ɛsɩnɩnɩ-mɩ. 
English:: Note: The above list is not exhaustive.

text: Patʋlɩ couchsurfing nɔnɔsɩ kɔlaɣ fenaɣ 2004 taa, Ordinatɛɛrɩwaa ɖʋtʋ laɖʋ weyi payaɣ se Casey Fenton yɔ ehiɣ ɛsɔdaa lɔɔɖɩyɛ nɖɩ ɖɩtɩkɩlɩ liidiye nɛ ewolo Isilandɩ ɛjaɖɛ taa wayɩ lɛ, ɛlɛ ɛtaahiɣ ɖɩzʋyɛ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Patʋlɩ couchsurfing nɔnɔsɩ kɔlaɣ fenaɣ 2004 taa, Ordinatɛɛrɩwaa ɖʋtʋ laɖʋ weyi payaɣ se Casey Fenton yɔ ehiɣ ɛsɔdaa lɔɔɖɩyɛ nɖɩ ɖɩtɩkɩlɩ liidiye nɛ ewolo Isilandɩ ɛjaɖɛ taa wayɩ lɛ, ɛlɛ ɛtaahiɣ ɖɩzʋyɛ. 
English:: The website: The website was launched in 2004 by computer programmer Casey Fenton, who wanted to provide cheap flights to remote islands for people who couldn't afford to fly themselves.

text: Sukuli ɛgɔndʊ waɖɛ takayaɣ wɛna cɛyɩtʋ sakɩyɛ pɩkɩlɩ ɛsɩkpena yaa manzʋʋ malɩɩ ɛgɔndʊ takayaɣ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Sukuli ɛgɔndʊ waɖɛ takayaɣ wɛna cɛyɩtʋ sakɩyɛ pɩkɩlɩ ɛsɩkpena yaa manzʋʋ malɩɩ ɛgɔndʊ takayaɣ. 
English:: Note: The larger the wheel, the more powerful the scooter.

text: Paa tɛtʋ ndʋ nɛ tɩtɛ paɣtʋ pɩlɩnaa kpɛdɛyɛ taa tɩlasɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ ɛyʋ wɛ lɔrɩyɛ taa yɔ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Paa tɛtʋ ndʋ nɛ tɩtɛ paɣtʋ pɩlɩnaa kpɛdɛyɛ taa tɩlasɩ alɩwaatʋ ndʋ ɛyʋ wɛ lɔrɩyɛ taa yɔ. 
English:: Note: This is not a list of all possible suffixes that can be added to nouns.

text: Paa agbaa sakɩyɛ ɩsɔɔlɩ faaa se amʋ a-hazasɩ yɔɔ nʋmɔʋ ɖɩjaɣyɛ kazʋʋ taa sakɩyɛ yɔ, nʋmɔʋ agbaa taa tʋmlaɖaa sakɩyɛ kaŋ pa-ñʋŋ nɛ ŋgee nʋmaŋ wobu nɩɩyɩ, liidiye tamasɩ nasɩyɩ labʋ yaa lona naayɛ taa wobu.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Paa agbaa sakɩyɛ ɩsɔɔlɩ faaa se amʋ a-hazasɩ yɔɔ nʋmɔʋ ɖɩjaɣyɛ kazʋʋ taa sakɩyɛ yɔ, nʋmɔʋ agbaa taa tʋmlaɖaa sakɩyɛ kaŋ pa-ñʋŋ nɛ ŋgee nʋmaŋ wobu nɩɩyɩ, liidiye tamasɩ nasɩyɩ labʋ yaa lona naayɛ taa wobu. 
English:: Note: If you are using a standard battery, the charger may take a while to charge completely, depending on the size of the battery and the number of times it has been used.

text: Nɔmɔʋ wobiyaa pɩzɩɣ nɛ pakatɩ kpɩna kɩdɛkɛda wena paasɩŋ-yɛ hɔɔlʋʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa palɩnaa yɔ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Nɔmɔʋ wobiyaa pɩzɩɣ nɛ pakatɩ kpɩna kɩdɛkɛda wena paasɩŋ-yɛ hɔɔlʋʋ ŋgʋ kɩ-taa palɩnaa yɔ. 
English:: Note: This service is only available to those who have a valid passport.

text: Nɛ hayo kiŋ, iwolo nɛ ɩna Notre-Dame se Fatima ɛsɔ sɛtʋ lone, lone nɖɩ pasɩm-ɖɩ ɛjaɖɛ kpeekpe yɔɔ se Maarɩɩ lɩɣ ɛyaa yɔɔ ɖɩtaa yɔ
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Nɛ hayo kiŋ, iwolo nɛ ɩna Notre-Dame se Fatima ɛsɔ sɛtʋ lone, lone nɖɩ pasɩm-ɖɩ ɛjaɖɛ kpeekpe yɔɔ se Maarɩɩ lɩɣ ɛyaa yɔɔ ɖɩtaa yɔ 
English:: See also: Notre-Dame de Fatima

text: Ŋpɩzɩɣ nɛ ŋsʋʋ boda-boda (kpokpo takasii) nɛ ŋcɔɔ Goma tɛtʋ taa. Ye ŋŋwoki poliŋ yɔ liidiye nɖɩ pʋpɔzʋʋ se pamʋ-ŋ yɔ (peeɖe liidiye) lɛ 500.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Ŋpɩzɩɣ nɛ ŋsʋʋ boda-boda (kpokpo takasii) nɛ ŋcɔɔ Goma tɛtʋ taa. Ye ŋŋwoki poliŋ yɔ liidiye nɖɩ pʋpɔzʋʋ se pamʋ-ŋ yɔ (peeɖe liidiye) lɛ 500. 
English:: Taxi drivers: Boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) are the only means of transportation in Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs (CDF) for a short ride.

text: Mbaa nɩ pɔzɔlɩ awayɩ ameya tɔm yɔ, teŋgu ni essoda paklɔmʋ wɛ feveɖe.
translated_text:
Kabiyè:  Mbaa nɩ pɔzɔlɩ awayɩ ameya tɔm yɔ, teŋgu ni essoda paklɔmʋ wɛ feveɖe. 
English:: The main components of a cell are DNA, RNA, and proteins.

text: Laʋ taa nɩŋgbanzɩ ɖɔm (mbʋ payaɣ ɖɔɖɔ se "ñɩtʋ taa yɛlʋʋ" yaa "nɩŋgbanzɩ ɖɔm") kɛnɩ ñɩɣtʋ cabɩ yaa avema sakɩyɛ nʋmɔʋ ɖɔm.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Laʋ taa nɩŋgbanzɩ ɖɔm (mbʋ payaɣ ɖɔɖɔ se "ñɩtʋ taa yɛlʋʋ" yaa "nɩŋgbanzɩ ɖɔm") kɛnɩ ñɩɣtʋ cabɩ yaa avema sakɩyɛ nʋmɔʋ ɖɔm. 
English:: Note: The word "go" is often translated as "come" (e.g. "come here" is often translated as "go").

text: Mbʋ pɩbɩzɩɣ nɛ pɩsɩna nɛ wondu talɩ lɔŋ yɔ, pʋwɛɛ sɩ ɩhɛyɩ nɛ mayaɣ nakɛyɛ wɛɛ wondu ndʋ tʋ-yɔɔ. Ɛsɔtaa lɔɔɖa ɩɩpɩzɩɣ nɛ pɛɖɛna wondu ɖeke nɛ patakpaɣ nɔmɔwoɖaa. Peeɖe ɩsʋʋ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Mbʋ pɩbɩzɩɣ nɛ pɩsɩna nɛ wondu talɩ lɔŋ yɔ, pʋwɛɛ sɩ ɩhɛyɩ nɛ mayaɣ nakɛyɛ wɛɛ wondu ndʋ tʋ-yɔɔ. Ɛsɔtaa lɔɔɖa ɩɩpɩzɩɣ nɛ pɛɖɛna wondu ɖeke nɛ patakpaɣ nɔmɔwoɖaa. Peeɖe ɩsʋʋ. 
English:: The same: The blade on a scissors should be sharp and the edge should be clean. The metal of the blade should be straight.

text: Pɔsɔzɩ lɔɔɖa 300 lɔɔɖa wena pɩwɛɛ se paya yɔ a-yɔɔ kɔyɔ, pɩtɩŋa pɩkpɛndɩɣ lɔɔɖa 1300 nɛ piyeki se ɛyaa ɛtaakɩlɩ ɖɔʋ lɔɔɖa taa.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Pɔsɔzɩ lɔɔɖa 300 lɔɔɖa wena pɩwɛɛ se paya yɔ a-yɔɔ kɔyɔ, pɩtɩŋa pɩkpɛndɩɣ lɔɔɖa 1300 nɛ piyeki se ɛyaa ɛtaakɩlɩ ɖɔʋ lɔɔɖa taa. 
English:: The government has announced that it will provide 300 new buses for the city, and will also provide 1300 new private buses to help ease the traffic jams.

text: Hɔŋ weyi ɩ-taa piya evelisi nɛ piya ajama wɛɛ yɔ, pɩpɩzɩɣ nɛ pʋpɔzɩ-ɩ tɩ-ñʋʋzʋʋ nɛ pɩkɩlɩ. Ɛlɛ papɩzɩɣ palɩɩ evemiye pilim nɛ awayɩ paa pɛwɛnɩ piya cɩɩɩ waa yaa piya ajama kɔyɔ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Hɔŋ weyi ɩ-taa piya evelisi nɛ piya ajama wɛɛ yɔ, pɩpɩzɩɣ nɛ pʋpɔzɩ-ɩ tɩ-ñʋʋzʋʋ nɛ pɩkɩlɩ. Ɛlɛ papɩzɩɣ palɩɩ evemiye pilim nɛ awayɩ paa pɛwɛnɩ piya cɩɩɩ waa yaa piya ajama kɔyɔ. 
English:: The second: The speed of the second gear is slower than that of the first gear, and the force required to turn the second gear is smaller than that of the first gear. So the second gear is easier to turn.

text: Weyi ɛsaɣ-kʋ ɖooo ɛsɔdaa yaa pʋʋ kajalanzɩ taa yɔ, pɩwɛɛ se ɩla tamaɣ se etiki ɖɔmbɛ yɔɔ yaa ɖenɖe nikaɣ wɩ siŋŋ yɔ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Weyi ɛsaɣ-kʋ ɖooo ɛsɔdaa yaa pʋʋ kajalanzɩ taa yɔ, pɩwɛɛ se ɩla tamaɣ se etiki ɖɔmbɛ yɔɔ yaa ɖenɖe nikaɣ wɩ siŋŋ yɔ. 
English:: Note: This product is not waterproof, so don't wear it while swimming or showering.

text: Nɔnɔɔ taa yɔ, Timbuktu pɩsɩ kʊñɔwiyee tɛtʋ, paa ɛyaa e-kpɩyɩɩ-ɖɩ pɩlɩnaa ɖɩtɛ kɔjɔka aleɣyaa nʋmɔʋ nɛ ɖɩ-tɛ Ɛsɔdaa lɔɔɖɩyɛ kaɣtaɣ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Nɔnɔɔ taa yɔ, Timbuktu pɩsɩ kʊñɔwiyee tɛtʋ, paa ɛyaa e-kpɩyɩɩ-ɖɩ pɩlɩnaa ɖɩtɛ kɔjɔka aleɣyaa nʋmɔʋ nɛ ɖɩ-tɛ Ɛsɔdaa lɔɔɖɩyɛ kaɣtaɣ. 
English:: Today, Timbuktu is a poor, dusty town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction in the Sahara, especially in the summer.

text: Alɩwaatʋ ndʋ ɖɔmbɛ tɛŋ nɩɣ yɔ, ɖɔmbɛ pɩzɩɣ atɔlɩ alɩwaatʋ pazɩ taa yem nɛ pɩɖɩɣ-mɩ nʋmɔʋ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Alɩwaatʋ ndʋ ɖɔmbɛ tɛŋ nɩɣ yɔ, ɖɔmbɛ pɩzɩɣ atɔlɩ alɩwaatʋ pazɩ taa yem nɛ pɩɖɩɣ-mɩ nʋmɔʋ. 
English:: Note: The temperature of the water in the pool is not hot, but warm.

text: Ye ɩsɔɔlaa se ɩcɔɔ kedeŋa kpeekpe nɛ hadɛ kiŋ kɔyɔ, ɛsɔdaa lɔɔɖa wena ɩkaɣ sʋʋ nɩ lona wena a-taa ɩkaɣ sɔɔlʋʋ wobu yɔ pɩwɛɣnɩ kamaɣ mbʋ pʋyɔɔ yɔ habɛɛ wena atɛzɩɣ teŋgunaa yɔ, atɩɖɔɔ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Ye ɩsɔɔlaa se ɩcɔɔ kedeŋa kpeekpe nɛ hadɛ kiŋ kɔyɔ, ɛsɔdaa lɔɔɖa wena ɩkaɣ sʋʋ nɩ lona wena a-taa ɩkaɣ sɔɔlʋʋ wobu yɔ pɩwɛɣnɩ kamaɣ mbʋ pʋyɔɔ yɔ habɛɛ wena atɛzɩɣ teŋgunaa yɔ, atɩɖɔɔ. 
English:: Note: This is a very dangerous move, and can lead to your falling off the mountain, so make sure you have good balance and are not afraid of heights before trying this move.

text: Ɛsɔtaa lɔɔɖa pilinzi ɛzɩ: Emirate, Etihad Airway, Qatar Airways nɛ Turkih Airlines wɛna nɔmɔʋ wobʋ sakɩyɛ Afrika taa nɛ tʋma ndɩ ndɩ, patɩŋgɩɣna ajɛya sakɩyɛ taa nɛ tɛtʋ sɔsɔtʋ sakɩyɛ taa Afrika nɛ papayiɣ na ɖama pɛ-tɛ liidiye ɖʋʋ taa pɩcɛsɩ pilinzi lɛɛsɩ.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Ɛsɔtaa lɔɔɖa pilinzi ɛzɩ: Emirate, Etihad Airway, Qatar Airways nɛ Turkih Airlines wɛna nɔmɔʋ wobʋ sakɩyɛ Afrika taa nɛ tʋma ndɩ ndɩ, patɩŋgɩɣna ajɛya sakɩyɛ taa nɛ tɛtʋ sɔsɔtʋ sakɩyɛ taa Afrika nɛ papayiɣ na ɖama pɛ-tɛ liidiye ɖʋʋ taa pɩcɛsɩ pilinzi lɛɛsɩ. 
English: Airlines: Airlines that fly to Africa include Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways, and Turkish Airlines.

text: Patɩɖʋ nʋmɔʋ ɖɔm ɖʋtʋ natʋyʋ nɛ pɔsɔzɩ nɛ ɛsɔdaa sulukiŋ ɩɩkaɣ sɩŋʋʋ Wembley, nɛ lɔɔɖa ɖɩzɩŋɩyɛ nɛ lɔɔɖa ɖɩzɩŋɩyɛ kɩsɔzaa fɛyɩ tataa.
translated_text:
Kabiyè: Patɩɖʋ nʋmɔʋ ɖɔm ɖʋtʋ natʋyʋ nɛ pɔsɔzɩ nɛ ɛsɔdaa sulukiŋ ɩɩkaɣ sɩŋʋʋ Wembley, nɛ lɔɔɖa ɖɩzɩŋɩyɛ nɛ lɔɔɖa ɖɩzɩŋɩyɛ kɩsɔzaa fɛyɩ tataa. 
English:: Tickets: Tickets are on sale at the Ticket Office at Wembley Stadium from 10:00 a.m. on the day of the match.
